verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> [Tmiz-MorA Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. of David חַלְּצֵ֣נִי <WH2502> chal-le-Tze-ni Deliver יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh me O LORD מֵאָדָ֣ם <WH120> me-'a-Dam man רָ֑ע <WH7451> Ra'; from the evil מֵאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> me-'Ish man חֲמָסִ֣ים <WH2555> cha-ma-Sim me from the violent תִּנְצְרֵֽנִי׃ <WH5341> tin-tze-Re-ni. preserve

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Who חָשְׁב֣וּ <WH2803> cha-she-Vu Which imagine רָע֣וֹת <WH7451> ra-'ot mischiefs בְּלֵ֑ב <WH3820> be-Lev; in [their] heart כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all manner י֝֗וֹם <WH3117> Yom, continually יָג֥וּרוּ <WH1481> ya-Gu-ru are they gathered together מִלְחָמֽוֹת׃ <WH4421> mil-cha-Mot. [for] war

שָֽׁנֲנ֣וּ <WH8150> sha-na-Nu They have sharpened לְשׁוֹנָם֮ <WH3956> le-sho-Nam their tongues כְּֽמוֹ־ <WH3644> ke-mov- as נָ֫חָ֥שׁ <WH5175> na-Chash like a serpent חֲמַ֥ת <WH2534> cha-Mat poison עַכְשׁ֑וּב <WH5919> 'ach-Shuv; adders' תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat is under שְׂפָתֵ֣ימוֹ <WH8193> se-fa-Tei-mov [is] under their lips סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

שָׁמְרֵ֤נִי <WH8104> sha-me-Re-ni Keep יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh me O LORD מִ֘ידֵ֤י <WH3027> mi-Dei from the hands רָשָׁ֗ע <WH7563> ra-Sha', of the wicked מֵאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> me-'Ish man חֲמָסִ֣ים <WH2555> cha-ma-Sim me from the violent תִּנְצְרֵ֑נִי <WH5341> tin-tze-Re-ni; preserve אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Who חָ֝שְׁב֗וּ <WH2803> cha-she-Vu, who have purposed לִדְח֥וֹת <WH1760> lid-Chot to overthrow פְּעָמָֽי׃ <WH6471> pe-'a-Mai. my goings

טָֽמְנֽוּ־ <WH2934> ta-me-nu- have hid גֵאִ֨ים׀ <WH1343> ge-'Im The proud פַּ֡ח <WH6341> pach a snare לִ֗י Li, וַחֲבָלִ֗ים <WH2256> va-cha-va-Lim, for me and cords פָּ֣רְשׂוּ <WH6566> Pa-re-su they have spread רֶ֭שֶׁת <WH7568> Re-shet a net לְיַד־ <WH3027> le-yad- by מַעְגָּ֑ל <WH4570> ma'-Gal; the wayside מֹקְשִׁ֖ים <WH4170> mo-ke-Shim gins שָֽׁתוּ־ <WH7896> sha-tu- they have set לִ֣י li סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. for me Selah

אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti I said לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֵ֣לִי <WH410> 'E-li Thou [art] my God אָ֑תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah; you הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <WH238> ha-'a-Zi-nah hear יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <WH8469> ta-cha-nu-Nai. of my supplications

יְהֹוִ֣ה <WH3069> Yah-weh O GOD אֲ֭דֹנָי <WH136> 'A-do-nai the Lord עֹ֣ז <WH5797> 'oz the strength יְשׁוּעָתִ֑י <WH3444> ye-shu-'a-Ti; of my salvation סַכֹּ֥תָה <WH5526> sak-Ko-tah thou hast covered לְ֝רֹאשִׁ֗י <WH7218> le-ro-Shi, my head בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in the day נָֽשֶׁק׃ <WH5402> Na-shek. of battle

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> tit-Ten Grant יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh not O LORD מַאֲוַיֵּ֣י <WH3970> ma-'a-vai-Yei the desires רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> ra-Sha'; of the wicked זְמָמ֥וֹ <WH2162> ze-ma-Mo not his wicked device אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תָּ֝פֵ֗ק <WH6329> ta-Fek, further יָר֥וּמוּ <WH7311> ya-Ru-mu [lest] they exalt סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. themselves Selah

רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> rosh [As for] the head מְסִבָּ֑י <WH4524> me-sib-Bai; of those that compass me about עֲמַ֖ל <WH5999> 'a-Mal let the mischief שְׂפָתֵ֣ימוֹ <WH8193> se-fa-Tei-mov of their own lips; יְכַסּוּמֹו ye-chas-su-mov כיְכַסֵּֽמֹו <WH3680> ye-chas-Se-mov clad self ק

יָמִיטוּ ya-mi-tu כיִמֹּ֥וטוּ <WH4131> yim-Mo-tu be carried קעֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem, and גֶּֽחָ֫לִ֥ים <WH1513> ge-Cha-Lim Let burning coals בָּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh into the fire יַפִּלֵ֑ם <WH5307> yap-pi-Lem; upon them let them be cast בְּ֝מַהֲמֹר֗וֹת <WH4113> be-ma-ha-mo-Rot, into deep pits בַּֽל־ <WH1077> bal- cannot יָקֽוּמוּ׃ <WH6965> ya-Ku-mu. that they rise not up again

אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish man לָשׁוֹן֮ <WH3956> la-shOn babbler בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- lest יִכּ֪וֹן <WH3559> yik-Kon be established בָּ֫אָ֥רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz in the earth אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- man חָמָ֥ס <WH2555> cha-Mas the violent רָ֑ע <WH7451> Ra'; evil יְ֝צוּדֶ֗נּוּ <WH6679> ye-tzu-Den-nu, shall hunt לְמַדְחֵפֹֽת׃ <WH4073> le-mad-che-Fot. to overthrow

יָדַעְתָּ ya-da'-ta כיָדַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> ya-Da'-ti, acknowledge קכִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> ya-'a-Seh will maintain יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh that the LORD דִּ֣ין <WH1779> din the cause עָנִ֑י <WH6041> 'a-Ni; of the afflicted מִ֝שְׁפַּ֗ט <WH4941> mish-Pat, [and] the right אֶבְיֹנִֽים׃ <WH34> 'ev-yo-Nim. of the poor

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> 'ach Surely צַ֭דִּיקִים <WH6662> Tzad-di-kim Surely the righteous יוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> yo-Du shall give thanks לִשְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> lish-Me-cha; unto thy name יֵשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> ye-she-Vu shall dwell יְ֝שָׁרִ֗ים <WH3477> ye-sha-Rim, the upright אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha. in thy presence
